rules_text:
Defender
[i]Diamant's Retainer[/i] – Whenever a creature you control attacks a player alone, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
[i]Swap[/i] – At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may have Jade, Iron Wall lose defender until end of turn. If you do, target creature you control gains defender until end of turn.
[i]Meditation[/i] – At the beginning of your end step, put a +1/+1 counter on up two target creatures that didn't attack this turn.
